thread.title: Tired room, small bed and noisy
thread.title_full: Tired room, small bed and noisy - Review of Premier Inn London Docklands (Excel) Hotel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: DailyMCritic
title: Tired room, small bed and noisy
text:
I booked into this hotel for business, staying 3 nights, we were given a room on the top floor and I was really shocked at the size of the supposed King Sized bed, I actually went to reception to double check and was assured it was a "King Size" well if you are over 6ft in height expect for your feet to be over-hanging. The room was heated with a small electric heater and you ended up getting either really hot or cold during the night. The room was very tired looking, the bathroom really needs a revamp. The double glazing and additional glazing does not keep the sound of the jets taking off at the nearby airport and expect to be woken at 5.00am by the trains! The only good thing about this hotel was the breakfast, there are certainly better hotels in the area and my company will be booking somewhere else in the future, it is worth paying the extra money to get a good nights sleep!!
Room Tip: Don't go on the top floor See more room tips
